amendment.description: To reduce the total construction general account in the Corps of Engineers, Flood Control, Mississippi River and Tributaries, etc., account by $14,750,000 and restore the appropriation for the Yazoo Basin Backwater Pumping Plant to the $250,000 level recommended by the President.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 23.

Amendment SA 230 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S1398-1401, S1404-1405; text: CR S1398) To reduce the total construction general account in the Corps of Engineers, Flood Control, Mississippi River and Tributaries, etc., account by $14,750,000 and restore the appropriation for the Yazoo Basin Backwater Pumping Plant to the $250,000 level recommended by the President.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 23.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 230 proposed by Senator McCain.
